nodes.title: üìã TEXT-TO-VIDEO - Quick Reference Index
widgets_values:
## üé¨ Text-to-Video Workflow v1.0 (Optimized)

**NO IMAGE NEEDED** - Generate video purely from text description!

---

### ‚ö° SPEED PRESETS
| Mode | Resolution | Frames | LoRA | Steps | Time |
|------|------------|--------|------|-------|------|
| üöÄ Preview | 512x320 | 33 | 0.5 | 2 | ~30s |
| ‚öñÔ∏è Balanced | 832x480 | 81 | 0.4 | 4 | ~5min |
| üíé Quality | 832x480 | 97 | 0.3 | 6 | ~10min |
| üé¨ Production | 1280x720 | 129 | 0.3 | 8 | ~25min |

---

### üìê RESOLUTION OPTIONS (16:9 Widescreen)
| Size | Name | VRAM | Best For |
|------|------|------|----------|
| 512x320 | Preview | ~15GB | Testing prompts |
| 832x480 | 480p | ~25GB | Standard quality |
| 1280x720 | 720p | ~40GB | High quality |

### üìê RESOLUTION OPTIONS (Other Ratios)
| Size | Ratio | VRAM | Best For |
|------|-------|------|----------|
| 480x832 | 9:16 | ~25GB | Mobile/TikTok/Reels |
| 512x512 | 1:1 | ~20GB | Square format |
| 768x768 | 1:1 | ~35GB | Square HQ |

---

### ‚è±Ô∏è FRAME COUNT ‚Üí DURATION @16fps
| Frames | Duration | Frames | Duration |
|--------|----------|--------|----------|
| 33 | ~2 sec | 97 | ~6 sec |
| 49 | ~3 sec | 129 | ~8 sec |
| 65 | ~4 sec | 161 | ~10 sec |
| 81 | ~5 sec | | |

---

### üéöÔ∏è LORA STRENGTH EFFECTS
| Value | Motion | Stability | Speed |
|-------|--------|----------|-------|
| 0.0 | N/A | Maximum | 40min |
| 0.3 | Subtle | Very Stable | ~5min |
| 0.4 | Balanced | Stable | ~4min |
| 0.5-0.6 | Dynamic | May shake | ~3min |
| 0.7 | Maximum | Experimental | ~3min |

nodes.title: üìù T2V PROMPT FORMULA
widgets_values:
## Text-to-Video Prompt Structure

```
[SUBJECT] + [APPEARANCE] + [ACTION] + 
[ENVIRONMENT] + [CAMERA] + [STYLE]
```

---

### Example Breakdown:

**Subject:** `A young woman`
**Appearance:** `with flowing red hair, wearing white dress`
**Action:** `walks gracefully through the field`
**Environment:** `golden wheat field at sunset`
**Camera:** `camera follows from behind, slowly rising`
**Style:** `cinematic, film grain, warm colors`

---

### Combined:
```
A young woman with flowing red hair, wearing a white dress, walks gracefully through a golden wheat field at sunset. Camera follows from behind, slowly rising. Cinematic film grain with warm golden colors.
```

nodes.title: üé¨ T2V PROMPT TEMPLATES
widgets_values:
## Copy & Customize:

**üë§ Person/Character:**
```
A [description] person [action]. They have [features]. Wearing [clothes]. [Environment]. [Camera movement]. Cinematic lighting.
```

**üåÑ Landscape/Nature:**
```
[Location] at [time of day]. [Weather/atmosphere]. [Moving elements like clouds, water, leaves]. Camera [movement]. [Color mood].
```

**üöó Vehicle/Action:**
```
A [vehicle] [action/movement] through [location]. [Speed/intensity]. [Effects like dust, reflections]. Dynamic tracking shot. [Style].
```

**üé≠ Abstract/Artistic:**
```
[Abstract concept] with [colors] flowing and morphing. [Textures] blend together. Hypnotic [movement type]. Dreamlike atmosphere.
```

**üêæ Animal:**
```
A [animal] [action] in [environment]. [Details about fur/feathers]. Natural movement. [Camera]. Wildlife documentary style.
```

nodes.title: üì∑ CAMERA KEYWORDS
widgets_values:
## Camera Movements:

| Keyword | Effect |
|---------|--------|
| `static shot` | No camera movement |
| `slow pan left/right` | Horizontal sweep |
| `tilt up/down` | Vertical movement |
| `dolly in` | Move toward subject |
| `dolly out` | Move away from subject |
| `tracking shot` | Follow the subject |
| `orbit shot` | Circle around subject |
| `crane shot` | Rise up dramatically |
| `handheld` | Slight natural shake |
| `steadicam` | Smooth floating motion |
| `POV shot` | First-person view |
| `aerial view` | From above |
| `low angle` | Looking up at subject |
| `dutch angle` | Tilted/dramatic |

nodes.title: üé® STYLE KEYWORDS
widgets_values:
## Visual Styles:

| Style | Keywords |
|-------|----------|
| Cinematic | `cinematic, film grain, anamorphic` |
| Realistic | `photorealistic, natural lighting` |
| Anime | `anime style, cel shaded, vibrant` |
| Dark/Moody | `noir, high contrast, shadows` |
| Bright/Happy | `vibrant colors, sunny, cheerful` |
| Vintage | `retro, 80s aesthetic, VHS` |
| Futuristic | `sci-fi, neon, cyberpunk` |
| Fantasy | `magical, ethereal, mystical` |
| Horror | `creepy, unsettling, dark` |
| Documentary | `natural, raw, authentic` |

## Lighting:
`golden hour` `blue hour` `dramatic lighting`
`soft diffused` `backlit` `rim lighting`
`neon glow` `candlelight` `moonlight`

nodes.title: üîß Model & LoRA Toolkit
widgets_values:
**üß† Diffusion Model:**
`wan2.1_t2v_14B` = Text-to-Video
`wan2.1_vace_14B` = Image-to-Video

---

**‚ö° Speed LoRA (CausVid):**
KEEP ENABLED for fast generation
- `0.3` ‚Üí Stable, ~5min
- `0.4` ‚Üí Balanced, ~4min ‚≠ê
- `0.5` ‚Üí Fast, ~3min

---

**üé® Custom Style LoRA:**
Currently **DISABLED** (mode=4)

To enable:
1. Right-click node
2. Select "Set Mode ‚Üí Always"
3. Select your LoRA file
4. Add trigger words to prompt

---

**üí° Using 2 LoRAs:**
Speed LoRA + Style LoRA work together!
Total strength adds up, so reduce if artifacts appear.

nodes.title: ‚úèÔ∏è STEP 1: Write Your Prompt
widgets_values: A majestic eagle soars through dramatic mountain peaks at golden hour. Its wings spread wide, catching the warm sunlight. Clouds drift slowly below. Camera tracks alongside the eagle in smooth motion. Cinematic, nature documentary style, stunning detail.

nodes.title: üö´ Negative Prompt
widgets_values: blurry, low quality, distorted, deformed, ugly, bad anatomy, extra limbs, missing limbs, floating limbs, disconnected limbs, mutation, mutated, disgusting, watermark, text, logo, static, frozen, jittery, flickering, duplicate frames, frame jumping, artifacts, noise, grain, overexposed, underexposed

nodes.title: üìê Video Settings Toolkit
widgets_values:
**Resolution Presets:**

| Ratio | Width | Height |
|-------|-------|--------|
| 16:9 | 832 | 480 | ‚≠ê
| 16:9 HD | 1280 | 720 |
| 9:16 | 480 | 832 |
| 1:1 | 512 | 512 |

**Length (frames @16fps):**
33‚Üí2s | 49‚Üí3s | 81‚Üí5s ‚≠ê
97‚Üí6s | 129‚Üí8s | 161‚Üí10s

**Batch Size:** Keep at 1

**üí° Start with:** 832x480, 81 frames
Scale up once happy with result!

nodes.title: üé≤ Sampler Toolkit
widgets_values:
**Seed:**
- `randomize` = New each time
- `fixed` = Reproduce exact result

**Steps (with LoRA):**
| Steps | Quality | Speed |
|-------|---------|-------|
| 2 | Draft | Fastest |
| 4 | Good | Fast ‚≠ê |
| 6 | Better | Medium |
| 8 | Best | Slower |

**CFG:** `1` with LoRA, `6` without

**Sampler:** `uni_pc` ‚≠ê or `dpmpp_2m`

**Scheduler:** `simple` ‚≠ê

**üí° Save seed of good results!**

nodes.title: üíæ Output Toolkit
widgets_values:
**Output Locations:**
`ComfyUI/output/t2v_video/` ‚Üí MP4
`ComfyUI/output/t2v_animation/` ‚Üí WebP

**MP4:** Best for sharing
**WebP:** Loops nicely, good for web

**üí° Tip:** Rename prefix for organization

nodes.title: üî• WORKFLOW STEPS
widgets_values:
## Quick Guide:

1Ô∏è‚É£ **Write detailed prompt** (green node)
‚Üì
2Ô∏è‚É£ **Set resolution & frames**
‚Üì
3Ô∏è‚É£ **Click Queue Prompt**
‚Üì
4Ô∏è‚É£ **Preview result**
‚Üì
5Ô∏è‚É£ **Find video in output folder**

**‚è±Ô∏è Time:** ~5 min (832x480, 81 frames)

nodes.title: üõ†Ô∏è TROUBLESHOOTING
widgets_values:
| Problem | Solution |
|---------|----------|
| Blurry | Steps ‚Üí 6, LoRA ‚Üí 0.3 |
| Wrong subject | Be more specific in prompt |
| Weird motion | Add motion keywords |
| Out of memory | Lower resolution |
| Too slow | Use 512x320, 33 frames |
| Artifacts | Improve negative prompt |
| Static video | Add action words |

**üí° Test at low res first!**
